dict.string: Notion Journal reads your Health data to sync sleep, workouts, blood pressure, weight, and medications into your local database.
Notion Journal does not write Health data, but needs permission to read and sync your Health records.
Notion Journal reads your clinical Health Records (medications) to sync into your local database.
Notion Journal needs access to your photo library to attach photos to notes.
Notion Journal saves photo thumbnails when you attach photos to notes.
